sentences.en: And what will the landowner do to those thieves?
sentences.cn: 这样园主要怎样处置那些盗贼 呢 ?

sentences.en: As a landowner, he was actively interested in agricultural improvements.
sentences.cn: 作为土地所有者, 他对于农业方面的改良怀有浓厚的兴趣.

sentences.en: He was going to call on a local landowner.
sentences.cn: 小货车在红色泥土路上行驶,不停地回火,发出突突声.

sentences.en: Needless to say, the landowner was bitterly distressed about this behaviour.
sentences.cn: 不用说园主对这事有多麽的痛苦悲哀.

sentences.en: The common land redistributed to one common landowner through negotiation.
sentences.cn: 三共有土地经共有人自行协议,分配为其中一人者.

sentences.en: The entrance to the cave was infilled by the landowner.
sentences.cn: 山洞的入口被地产的主人给堵上了。

sentences.en: The landowner decided to wall up the entrance.
sentences.cn: 土地的主人打算把入口封起来.

sentences.en: The landowner enlarged her property By repeated purchases.
sentences.cn: 土地拥有者不停购买以扩充她的财产.

sentences.en: The project was set up on the initiative of a local landowner.
sentences.cn: 工程是由当地一名土地所有者发起的.

sentences.en: The superficies or the permanent lease obligee shall claim for equivalent compensation to the landowner.
sentences.cn: 地上权人或永佃权人得向土地所有权人请求相当之补偿.

trans.tran_en: someone who owns land, especially a large amount of it
